thread.section_title: WTSmedia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WTSmedia | www.wtsmedia.com
thread.title: Dave Martinson

author: Dave Martinson
title: Dave Martinson
text: We have been using another supplier for years. They did a great job, but decided to retire from the business. THEY recommended that we contact WTS Media to do our DVD printing for us. We could not be more pleased with the personal service we receive from our rep Christy Bowen, and the quality work of the production team there. And the price is VERY fair and competitive. I highly recommend them if you are looking for a great supplier.
